description: The Milo short-sleeved men's workout shirt is a go-to active style for any workout. The unique blend of recycled poly and organic cotton provides an extremely versatile performance fabric that will match your most intense workouts, while maintaining a refined style you can wear anywhere. The Dri-release technology makes this pocket tee moisture wicking, quick dry, and cooling, while keeping you fresh. Bonus, these elements won't wash out over time, no matter how hard you challenge them.
name: Prana Milo Shirt - Mens
